name: Lost Drop Canyon
description:
This canyon has been explored. It is an easy solo or side trip. Anchors placed will be removed as this canyon can be explored without rope. If you want to rappel off the tree at the head of the canyon it is reccomended to use a retrievable anchor and a 120' rope. This rappel lands you at the bottom of the canyon. You can gear down here.

Approach

Descent

120' rope 120' pull cord Fiddle stick / CEM / etc.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
